TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToBase64Transform extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform
type ToBase64Transform = class interface ICryptoTransform interface IDisposable

span.span: Converts a to base 64.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Base 64 内容传输编码表示任意位序列中窗体的不是人类可读。Base 64 Content-Transfer-Encoding represents arbitrary bit sequences in a form that is not human readable. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的成员类。The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanTransformMultipleBlocks As Boolean
public: property bool CanTransformMultipleBlocks { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可转换多个块。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether multiple blocks can be transformed.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在当前实现中，只能有一个块可以转换一次，因此此属性始终为`false`。In the current implementation, only one block can be transformed at a time, so this property is always `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法以验证是否可以转换多个块。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to verify that multiple blocks can be transformed. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是对的简单调用。This method is a simple call to . 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源重新分配用于其他目的。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法以通过在当前转换释放未使用的资源。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to free up unused resources by the current transform. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform/CPP/members.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform/CS/members.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform/VB/members.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 将释放设置为 `Dispose`，调用 `false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请小心不要引用在早期调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: Gets the input block size.

value.span: 输入数据块的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size of the input data blocks in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换的输入的块大小为 3 个字节。The input block size for this transformation is 3 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用属性来检索当前转换的输入的块大小。The following code example demonstrates how to call the property to retrieve the input block size of the current transform. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Gets the output block size.

value.span: 输出数据块的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size of the output data blocks in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换的输出块大小是 4 个字节。The output block size for this transformation is 4 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用属性以创建新的字节数组大小为输出块的大小。The following code example demonstrates how to call the property to create a new byte array with the size of the output block size. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. public int TransformBlock (byte[] inputBuffer, int inputOffset, int inputCount, byte[] outputBuffer, int outputOffset);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 TransformBlock(unsigned int8[] inputBuffer, int32 inputOffset, int32 inputCount, unsigned int8[] outputBuffer, int32 outputOffset) cil managed
Public Function TransformBlock (inputBuffer As Byte(), inputOffset As Integer, inputCount As Integer, outputBuffer As Byte(), outputOffset As Integer) As Integer
public: virtual int TransformBlock(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ inputBuffer, int inputOffset, int inputCount, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ outputBuffer, int outputOffset);
abstract member TransformBlock : byte[] * int * int * byte[] * int -> int override this.TransformBlock : byte[] * int * int * byte[] * int -> int

param.name: inputBuffer
param.span: 要计算为 Base 64 的输入。

span.span: The input to compute to base 64.

param.name: inputOffset
param.span: 输入字节数组中的偏移量，从该位置开始使用数据。

span.span: The offset into the input byte array from which to begin using data.

param.name: inputCount
param.span: 输入字节数组中用作数据的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes in the input byte array to use as data.

param.name: outputBuffer
param.span: 要向其写入结果的输出。

span.span: The output to which to write the result.

param.name: outputOffset
param.span: 输入字节数组中的偏移量，从该位置开始使用数据。

span.span: The offset into the output byte array from which to begin writing data.

summary.span: 将输入字节数组的指定区域转换为 Base 64，并将结果复制到输出字节数组的指定区域。

span.span: Converts the specified region of the input byte array to base 64 and copies the result to the specified region of the output byte array.
The number of bytes written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一种块算法，处理 3 个字节的输入的块，并创建 4 个字节的输出块。The class is a block algorithm that processes input blocks of 3 bytes and creates output blocks of 4 bytes. 方法将为 24 位的输入的块转换为 32 位的字符数据。The method transforms an input block of 24 bits into 32 bits of character data. 为了匹配块转换，你必须始终为 4 个字节的输出边界的 3 个字节输入的边界。You must maintain 3 byte input boundaries to 4 byte output boundaries in order to match the block transform. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法来遍历`inputBytes`转换的`blockSize`。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to iterate through `inputBytes` transforming by `blockSize`. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform/CPP/members.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform/CS/members.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform/VB/members.vb#8)]
